Welcome to my website !

I am a PhD student in oceanography at the LOCEAN laboratory (IPSL), in Paris. I am expected to continue working on the same subject but as a research engineer in the same lab, starting spring 2023.

I work on the impact of sub-mesoscale fronts on the productivity and biodiversiy of phytoplankton. I have also developped various that could be used by other. You can find more information is the section “My work”.

Contact

You can find me:

  • at clement.haeck@locean.ipsl.fr.
  • on Gitlab (IN2P3) where is kept my PhD work
  • on GitHub where I keep other projects
  • or in my office, campus Jussieu in 45-55 426.
